channel.title: Killzone 2 on Shantanu Vs The World
channel.description: Recent content in Killzone 2 on Shantanu Vs The World

item.title: Killzone 2 Tips Tricks Tactics And Strategies : Engineer
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: Killzone 2 (KZ2) is one of my most favourite games for the Playstation 3. Killzone 2 is a very different game as compared to the other run-of-the-mill FPS's out there. Now, I might not be the best player out there but I've played my fair share of it. So, I thought of jotting down some quick points for the different classes, how to play them and how to make the most of them according to my opinion.

item.title: KillZone 2 Steel-Book Edition is here
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: Note: Please DIGG this post by clicking here or Reddit this post by clicking here. I'll be one of the proud owners of a very special steel book edition of Killzone 2 very soon. The cool part being that it'd be much before most of the rest of the world gets to even see these little babies because the official release date is still five days away. And the icing on the cake “A free classic Art Book”.
